input.sentences: we decided to visit the famous church | and it was kind of scary .
but also kind of calming with all of these lit candles .
i did n't recognize a lot of the decor | and especially this doll ?
they had some great windows that looked antique and brand new at the same time .
the cross was so much bigger than what this picture shows ! i 'm glad we went .
output.sentences: The picture on the wall depicted a monk who was lifting a prayer to God.
As the candles flickered, the scene was somber.
A doll was under a small spotlight between a monk and a nun.
The sun suddenly was blocked with no light coming through the stained glass window.
The image of the Christ suddenly burst into view.
